lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies will be without leading scorer Marc Gasol for the rest of the National Basketball Association season after the Spaniard had surgery to repair a fracture in his right foot, the team said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Grizzlies Top Scorer Gasol Out for Season After Surgery
headline.main: Grizzlies Top Scorer Gasol Out for Season After Surgery

snippet: The Memphis Grizzlies will be without leading scorer Marc Gasol for the rest of the National Basketball Association season after the Spaniard had surgery to repair a fracture in his right foot, the team said on Tuesday....
